NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
Station KUOM
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis lip, Minnesota
Dr. Harry J. Skornia
NAEB
September 3, 1957
lip Gregory Hall ‘
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
I have just read Kenneth Yourd*s letter of August 8
relative to the proposal of Ralph Hall of Kent State
University.
It looks as though Ken*s comments are quite all right.
Do you, Harold and Bob Underwood want to draw up a state¬
ment outlining your suggestions? Do you want me to? Or do
you want to draw one up for me to send to Kent State?
It doesn*t make any difference to me which procedure
we follow, although it seems less cumbersome for you folks
to work out the details, since this is a problem with which
you are more closely involved than anyone else.
Meanwhile, I will merely acknowlege with thanks the
letter from Ken Yourd (a copy enclosed)
Yours sincerely
Burton Paulu
President
